What services does Jupiter Digital Technologies offer?

Jupiter Digital Technologies provides comprehensive digital solutions including web development, Android and iOS app development, AI integration, digital marketing, e-commerce platforms, payment gateway integration, CMS development, web hosting, email automation, UI/UX design, and SEO optimization. We specialize in building scalable, secure, and user-friendly products for startups and growing businesses.

How much does a website development project cost?

Website Type Pages Price Range
Landing Page 1 ₹2k – ₹8k+
Normal Website 4–6 ₹8k – ₹25k+
Complex Website Unlimited ₹30k – ₹1.5L+

We provide custom quotes after understanding your requirements during a free consultation. Transparent pricing with no hidden fees.

What is your development process?

Our process includes: 1) Discovery & Planning (requirements gathering), 2) Design & Prototyping (UI/UX mockups), 3) Development (coding with regular updates), 4) Testing & Quality Assurance, 5) Launch & Deployment, 6) Post-launch support. We use agile methodologies for efficient delivery and keep you involved throughout.

How long does it take to build a website or app?

Timelines depend on scope: simple websites (1-2 weeks), complex sites or apps (4-8 weeks), full e-commerce platforms (6-12 weeks). We prioritize quality over speed but work efficiently to meet your deadlines. Rush projects are available with additional resources.

Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?

Yes, we offer comprehensive post-launch support including bug fixes, updates, security patches, performance optimization, and feature enhancements. Our maintenance packages start at ₹8,000/month and can be customized based on your needs.

Can you work with existing websites or apps?

Absolutely. We specialize in improving and scaling existing digital products. Whether you need to add new features, optimize performance, migrate to new technologies, or redesign the UI/UX, we can help. We start with a thorough audit of your current setup.

What technologies and frameworks do you use?

We use modern, scalable technologies: Frontend (React, Vue.js, Angular), Backend (Node.js, Python, PHP), Mobile (React Native, Flutter, Swift/Kotlin), Databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL), Cloud (AWS, Google Cloud, Vercel), AI (OpenAI, TensorFlow). We choose the best tools for each project.

How do you ensure data security and privacy?

Security is paramount. We implement SSL encryption, secure coding practices, regular security audits, GDPR/CCPA compliance, and robust data protection measures. For apps handling sensitive data, we add additional layers like end-to-end encryption and secure API gateways.

Do you offer digital marketing services?

Yes, our digital marketing focuses on data-driven strategies that drive traffic, engagement, and measurable business growth. We provide strategic marketing solutions with transparent reporting and ROI tracking.

What makes Jupiter Digital Technologies different from other agencies?

Founded by Veer Momaya with numerous completed projects and high client satisfaction, we combine technical expertise with business acumen. We deliver end-to-end solutions, provide transparent communication, use cutting-edge technologies, and focus on long-term partnerships rather than one-off projects.

How do I get started with a project?

Contact us via the website form, WhatsApp, or phone. We'll schedule a free consultation to discuss your needs, goals, and budget. Within 24 hours, you'll receive a detailed proposal and project timeline. No obligations, just clear next steps.

What payment terms do you offer?

We typically require a 30-50% upfront payment to start, with milestones-based payments throughout the project. For larger projects, we offer flexible payment plans. All payments are processed securely, and we provide invoices for your records.
